word:
Will you bow before God in prayer every day and ask Him to let the light of His Holy Spirit come into your hearts, and do not cease pleading with God until every evil thought and feeling is overcome? Christ says, "Confess your faults one to another, and pray one for another, that ye may be healed." How much of this work have you 


                -22- 

done? Should the spirit of confession come into the church, you would surely see of the salvation of God.
